Uses of Class
org.gearvrf.GVRSceneObject

  • Packages that use GVRSceneObject 
    Package Description
    org.gearvrf
    You need to understand key points of this package to create a GVRF application.
    org.gearvrf.animation
    GVRF animations, version 2.0.
    org.gearvrf.scene_objects
    Specialized scene objects

    • Uses of GVRSceneObject in org.gearvrf

      Methods in org.gearvrf that return GVRSceneObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GVRSceneObject GVRSceneObject.getChildByIndex(int index)
      Get the child object at index.
      GVRSceneObject GVRPicker.GVRPickedObject.getHitObject()
      The GVRSceneObject within the eye pointee holder's bounding box - the object that the ray intersected.
      GVRSceneObject GVRSceneObject.getParent()
      Get the parent object. If the object has been added as a child to another GVRSceneObject, returns that object.
      GVRSceneObject[] GVRScene.getWholeSceneObjects() 
      Methods in org.gearvrf that return types with arguments of type GVRSceneObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Iterable<GVRSceneObject> GVRSceneObject.children()
      As an alternative to calling getChildrenCount() then repeatedly calling getChildByIndex(int), you can
      java.util.List<GVRSceneObject> GVRSceneObject.getChildren()
      Get all the children, in a single list.
      java.util.List<GVRSceneObject> GVRScene.getSceneObjects()
      The top-level scene objects.
      Methods in org.gearvrf with parameters of type GVRSceneObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Override this method to change the default splash screen size or position.
      static float GVRPicker.pickSceneObject(GVRSceneObject sceneObject, GVRCameraRig cameraRig)
      Tests the GVRSceneObject against the camera rig's lookat vector.

      void GVRScene.removeSceneObject(GVRSceneObject sceneObject)

    • Uses of GVRSceneObject in org.gearvrf.animation

      Constructors in org.gearvrf.animation with parameters of type GVRSceneObject 
      Constructor and Description
      GVRColorAnimation(GVRSceneObject target, float duration, float[] rgb)
      Animate the overlay color.
      GVRColorAnimation(GVRSceneObject target, float duration, int color)
      Animate the overlay color.
      GVROpacityAnimation(GVRSceneObject target, float duration, float opacity)
      Animate the opacity property.
      GVRRelativeMotionAnimation(GVRSceneObject target, float duration, float deltaX, float deltaY, float deltaZ)
      Animate a move by delta x/y/z.
      GVRRotationByAxisAnimation(GVRSceneObject target, float duration, float angle, float x, float y, float z)
      Use GVRTransform.rotateByAxis(float, float, float, float) to do an animated rotation about a specific axis.
      GVRRotationByAxisWithPivotAnimation(GVRSceneObject target, float duration, float angle, float axisX, float axisY, float axisZ, float pivotX, float pivotY, float pivotZ)
      Use GVRTransform.rotateByAxisWithPivot(float, float, float, float, float, float, float) to do an animated rotation about a specific axis with a specific pivot.
      GVRScaleAnimation(GVRSceneObject target, float duration, float scale)
      Scale the transform, by the same amount in each dimension.
      GVRScaleAnimation(GVRSceneObject target, float duration, float scaleX, float scaleY, float scaleZ)
      Scale the transform, by potentially different amounts in each dimension.
